org.plexian.grumy.entity

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.entity.EntityManager

  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the entities in a world.
    Author:
    walt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityManager(World world)
      Create a new EntityManager for the given world.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityManager

        public EntityManager(World world)
        Create a new EntityManager for the given world.
        Parameters:
        world - The world this entity manager belongs too.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
        Render the entities in the world.

      • update

        public void update(double delta)
        Update the entities in the world.
        Parameters:
        delta - The delta time

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose of this manager.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(Entity e)
        Add an entity to the manager. This adds it to the update and render loops.
        Parameters:
        e - The entity to add

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(Entity e)
        Remove an entity from the manager. This removes it from the update and render loops.
        Parameters:
        e - The entity to remove.

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(int id)
        Remove an entity by ID. removeEntity does the same thing but with an instance of entity.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the entity to remove.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity(int id)
        Get the entity with the given ID. CAUTION: Will return null!
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the entity to fetch.
        Returns:
        The entity or null if its not registered with this manager.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity(Location l)
        Deprecated. Not very accurate and returns null very easily.
        Get the entity at a given location.
        Parameters:
        l - The location to check for an entity.
        Returns:
        The entity at the location or null if none.

      • getEntities

        public java.util.Collection<Entity> getEntities()
        Get all the entities registered with this manager.
        Returns:
        A collection of all the entities.
